channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 14:39 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 14:39 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Watch for further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 14:29 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Dniprovsky rayon-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 14:29 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Dniprovsky rayon-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
